members.salientDetails: Although she doesn't do the best job hiding her membership, the Queen B is nonetheless the most influential member of the group. She was unanimously elected to be the group's Black Queen, a name more fitting for her than her predeccessors, in 2014.

Loving husband of Beyonce and money magnet. Jay Z's talent for entrepreneurship did not go unnoticed by the Organization. He was inducted as a member in 2008, and has been the treasurer for nearly his whole tenure.

A master of public deception, Hillary collaborated with Vladmir Putin in an effort to install a controllable puppet into the White House while simultanously bringing the public's suspicion of her membership to an all-time low. She doesn't mind pulling the strings behind the Presidency; she's done it before.
members.imgAlt: Hillary during a ritual Illuminati vampire sacrifice

members.salientDetails: Frequent lover of both Jay Z and Beyoncé. Exerts most of her influence behind the scenes.
members.imgAlt: Becky doesn't like actual pictures of herself on the internet

members.salientDetails: Approaching absolute political control over the 'former' soviet bloc. Recently installed a puppet in the oval office of the United States in collaboration with Hillary Clinton. Judo black belt.

The Muskiteer crashed onto the tech scene, and the Illuminati immediately snatched up this dynamo of a human being. We hope that he will be instrumental in setting up our Martian headquarters before the End Of Days here on Earth.
